# ods-tooltip



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                | Type                                     | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `label`    | `label`    | Describes the human-readble text diplayed within the tooltip.              | `string`                                 | `undefined` |
| `position` | `position` | Describes the position of the tooltip relative to the content in the slot. | `"bottom" \| "left" \| "right" \| "top"` | `undefined` |
